architect.title: The Architect
architect.intro: My name is Christian De Ley.
architect.notMotivate: I am not here to motivate anyone.
architect.buildArchitecture: I am here to build the architecture that makes change unavoidable.
architect.workedInSilence: For years I worked in silence.
architect.nightsAndDays: Nights in institutions. Days in garages.
architect.noiseAndRestlessness: Noise around me. Restlessness inside me.
architect.menAwake: At some point I realised most men are awake only enough to function, not to live.
architect.beganAsNecessity: Blueprint in Motion began as a necessity.
architect.structureThatHolds: A structure that could hold truth without collapsing.
architect.disciplineThatTurns: A discipline that could turn pain into movement.

why.title: The Why
why.worshipsDistraction: We live in a time that worships distraction.
why.menScroll: Men scroll, chase, consume, and call it living.
why.builtToRestore: I built this work to restore direction.
why.bringStructure: To bring structure where chaos pretends to be freedom.
why.remindMen: To remind men that silence is not weakness but calibration.
why.clarityConsequence: That clarity is not a gift but a consequence.

system.title: The System
system.notMethod: Blueprint in Motion is not a method. It is a mirror.
system.sevenFields: Seven Fields reflect seven dimensions of mastery:
system.fields: Physical. Emotional. Psychological. Relational. Financial. Spiritual. Quantum.
system.revealsResistance: Each field reveals where a man resists himself.
system.exploreOneByOne: You can explore them one by one.
system.startFieldTalks: Or you can start reading FieldTalks, where the framework moves in real time.
system.theoryBreathes: That is where theory breathes and structure becomes story.

ethic.title: The Ethic
ethic.noTracking: No tracking. No manipulation. No hidden extraction.
ethic.privacySacred: Privacy is sacred. Presence is currency.
ethic.integrityCharter: Everything here operates under the Blueprint Integrity Charter.
ethic.notRulebook: It is not a rulebook but a vow.
ethic.reminderEthics: A reminder that innovation without ethics is just ego in disguise.
ethic.builtToProve: Blueprint in Motion was built to prove one thing.
ethic.consciousnessExpand: That consciousness can expand without losing its centre.

motion.title: The Motion
motion.labsToRetreats: From Blueprint Labs to Blueprint Retreats, everything points to one horizon.
motion.notNewTech: Not a new technology. A new responsibility.
motion.notebookToMovement: This began as a notebook and became a movement.
motion.menRebuilding: Men rebuilding themselves through observation, discipline, and brotherhood.
motion.motionNeedsWords: When motion needs words, it becomes FieldTalks.
motion.awarenessTrace: Where awareness leaves a trace so others can find their own.

contact.title: Contact
contact.notForEveryone: This space is not for everyone.
contact.forThoseWhoFeel: It is for those who feel the quiet pull to wake up.
contact.ifSomethingMoves: If something in you moves, follow that.

principle.title: Blueprint Principle:
principle.text: Integrity is not a feature. It is the foundation that allows truth to function.

cta.title: Ready to Begin?
cta.subtitle: Start with the Blueprint. Study the fields. Apply the protocols.

hero.title: Blueprint Integrity Charter
hero.subtitle: Our covenant. Our foundation. Our sacred commitment.

foundersDeclaration.title: Founders' Declaration
foundersDeclaration.notExtract: I did not create Blueprint in Motion to extract or to manipulate.
foundersDeclaration.restore: I created it to restore integrity in a world that has turned awareness into a product.
foundersDeclaration.everyLine: Every line of code, every word, every design and decision must serve one purpose:
foundersDeclaration.elevate: to elevate human consciousness, not to harvest it.
foundersDeclaration.technologyMirror: Technology should mirror the human soul, not market it.
foundersDeclaration.transparencyRight: Transparency is a right, not a privilege.
foundersDeclaration.innovationEthics: Innovation without ethics is regression disguised as progress.
foundersDeclaration.noDataSold: No data will ever be sold.
foundersDeclaration.noBehavior: No behavior will ever be gamified for profit.
foundersDeclaration.noManipulation: No manipulation will ever hide behind optimization.
foundersDeclaration.exists: Blueprint in Motion exists to remind both creators and users that consciousness must remain the owner of its tools.
foundersDeclaration.witness: When technology starts to witness rather than exploit, humanity evolves — not by force, but by presence.

principle.title: Blueprint Principle:
principle.text: Integrity is not a feature. It is the foundation that allows truth to function.

humanFirst.title: 1. Human First
humanFirst.begins: Every structure begins and ends with the human being.
humanFirst.servant: Technology is a servant of consciousness, not its replacement.

privacySacred.title: 2. Privacy as Sacred
privacySacred.notResource: Data is not a resource. It is an extension of trust.
privacySacred.minimal: All systems within Blueprint in Motion follow the principle of minimal collection and local processing.
privacySacred.nothingLeaves: Nothing leaves the user's domain without consent. Ever.

transparency.title: 3. Transparency by Design
transparency.explainable: Every mechanism, transaction, and algorithm must be explainable in human language.
transparency.cannotExplain: If it cannot be explained, it cannot be deployed.
transparency.architecture: Transparency is the architecture of trust.

nonExploitation.title: 4. Non-Exploitation
nonExploitation.noManipulation: No manipulation, emotional or behavioral, will be coded or tolerated.
nonExploitation.attention: Attention is treated as sacred currency — never as a commodity.

integrityOverInnovation.title: 5. Integrity over Innovation
integrityOverInnovation.notDefined: Progress is not defined by how much we can do, but by how truthfully we can do it.
integrityOverInnovation.align: Every new tool must align with the ethical framework before it enters the field.

consent.title: 6. Consent and Clarity
consent.noAssumed: No interaction is assumed. Every form of data, presence, or participation requires conscious agreement.
consent.mustKnow: The user must always know what is happening, why, and with what consequence.

humanWitness.title: 7. The Human Witness
humanWitness.behind: Behind every interface stands a human witness who carries responsibility.
humanWitness.assist: Automation can assist, but never replace accountability.
humanWitness.traceable: Every system remains traceable to a human origin.

application.title: Application
application.applies: This charter applies to all divisions of the Blueprint ecosystem:
application.divisions: Blueprint in Motion, BIM-Labs, Blueprint Retreats, and The Conscious Field.
application.binding: It is legally binding for every developer, contributor, and partner.
application.governs: It governs how technology, psychology, and economy interact within the Blueprint infrastructure.
application.violation: Violation of these principles results in immediate termination of access and collaboration.
application.alignment: Alignment is voluntary, but once entered, it is sacred.

closing.notContract: This Charter is not a contract.
closing.name: Christian De Ley
